title: CHEMICAL MECHANICAL POLISHING OF SILICON CARBIDE COMPRISING SURFACES

samples.experiment_context: Example 1: Slurry with In-Situ Formed Soft Particles. Soft particles (MnCl3 and MnO2, Mohs <3) formed by 0.023M MnCl2 + 0.015M KMnO4. Polished silicon face SiC. Pressure 6.4 psi, rotation 90 rpm.

slurry_preparation.abrasive_material: In-situ formed MnCl3 and MnO2 particles

characterization.particle_morphology: Insoluble manganese compounds (MnCl3, MnO2), Mohs hardness < 3

samples.experiment_context: Example 2: Slurry with Soft Surfaced Composite Particles (Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coating on 135nm silica), No Oxidizer.

characterization.particle_morphology: Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coating on silica core. Coating Mohs hardness ~3, Silica core Mohs hardness ~7.

samples.experiment_context: Example 2: Slurry with Soft Surfaced Composite Particles (Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coating on 135nm silica), No Oxidizer.

characterization.particle_morphology: Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coating on silica core. Coating Mohs hardness ~3, Silica core Mohs hardness ~7.

samples.experiment_context: Example 2: Slurry with uncoated 135nm silica particles, No Oxidizer.
Example 2: Slurry with Soft Surfaced Composite Particles (Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coating on 135nm silica), No Oxidizer.

characterization.particle_morphology: Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coating on silica core. Coating Mohs hardness ~3, Silica core Mohs hardness ~7.

samples.experiment_context: Example 2: Slurry with Soft Surfaced Composite Particles (Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coating on alumina), No Oxidizer.

characterization.particle_morphology: Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coating on alumina core. Coating Mohs hardness ~3, Alumina core Mohs hardness ~9.

samples.experiment_context: Example 3: Slurry with Soft Surfaced Composite Particles (MnCl3/MnO2 coating on 135nm silica) with 0.35M KMnO4 oxidizer.
Example 3: Slurry with Soft Surfaced Composite Particles (MnCl3/MnO2 coating on 800nm alumina) with 0.35M KMnO4 oxidizer.
Example 3: Slurry with Soft Surfaced Composite Particles (MnCl3/MnO2 coating on 0.2 micron diamond) with 0.35M KMnO4 oxidizer.
Example 3: Slurry with Soft Surfaced Composite Particles (MnCl3/MnO2 coating on 300nm alumina) with 0.35M KMnO4 oxidizer.
Example 4: Potassium dichromate (0.1 mol) + 1% MnO2 coated 135 nm silica particle + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions: 6 psi, 0.17 m/sec linear velocity, 60 rpm head, 6H SiC wafer.
Example 4: Potassium Ferricyanide (0.1 mol) + 1% MnO2 coated 135 nm silica particle + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.
Example 4: Chromium (VI) oxide 2% + 1% 135 nm silica particle + 0.1 mol KMnO4 + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.
Example 4: Potassium Chromate (0.1 mol) + 1% 135 nm silica particle + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.
Example 4: Cupric sulfate (0.1 mol) + 1% 135 nm silica particle + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.
Example 4: Cupric sulfate (0.1 mol) + 1% MnO2 coated 135 nm silica particle + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.
Example 4: Cobaltous sulfate + 1% 135 nm silica particle + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.
Example 4: Cobaltous sulfate + 1% MnO2 coated 135 nm silica particle + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.
Example 4: Lithium Cobalt (III) Oxide (1%) + 1% 135 nm silica particle + 0.1 mol KMnO4 + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.
Example 4: Cupric sulfate (1%) + 1% 135 nm silica particle + (oxidizer not specified, assumed KMnO4 from context or general setup). Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.
Example 4: Cerium Oxide coated silica (75 nm) + 0.3 Mol KMnO4 + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.
Example 4: 1% SiC particle (<1500 grit) + 1% MnO2 coated 135 nm silica particle + 0.3 KMnO4 + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.

slurry_preparation.abrasive_material: SiC particle (<1500 grit) and MnO2 coated 135 nm silica

samples.experiment_context: Example 4: 1% Boron Nitride particle (0.3 to 0.7 nm) + 1% MnO2 coated 135 nm silica particle + 0.3 KMnO4 + water @ pH 2. Polishing conditions from Ex4 general.

slurry_preparation.abrasive_material: Boron Nitride particle (0.3-0.7nm) and MnO2 coated 135 nm silica

samples.experiment_context: Example 5: AFM Data. Silicon face on-axis 6H SiC wafer polished with soft functionalized silica cores (75nm) slurry. Silica functionalized with insoluble Mn+3/Mn+4 compounds. Polishing conditions as Ex1 (6.4 psi, 90 rpm).

slurry_preparation.abrasive_material: Soft functionalized 75 nm silica (functionalized with Mn+3/Mn+4 compounds)

characterization.other_observations: Terraced structures, atomic planes height ~2.5 A. AFM scan 10x10 microns.

samples.experiment_context: Example 5: AFM Data. Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coated 75nm silica particles in permanganate slurry. Polished silicon face on-axis 6H SiC. Polishing conditions as Ex1.
Example 5: AFM Data. 8 degree off-axis SiC Si faced wafer polished with 1% coated 135nm silica particle in 0.3M KMnO4. Polishing conditions as Ex1.

characterization.other_observations: No terracing observed on off-axis wafer.

samples.experiment_context: Example 5: AFM Data. Si faced 6H SiC surface polished with 1% Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coated alumina with 0.35M KMnO4 slurry. Polishing conditions as Ex1.

characterization.other_observations: Different surface terracing compared to silica.

samples.experiment_context: Example 5: AFM Data. 6H silicon faced SiC polished with 0.1% 5nm coated diamond and 1% 75nm Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coated silica with 0.3M KMnO4. Polishing conditions as Ex1.

slurry_preparation.abrasive_material: Coated diamond (5nm) and coated silica (75nm, Mn(III)/Mn(IV) coating)

characterization.other_observations: Excellent surface finish, no scratches detected.

samples.experiment_context: Example 6: Mixed Particle Systems. SiC silicon faced 6H substrates. 0.3M KMnO4, pH 3.0. Coating is Mn(III)/Mn(IV).
Example 6: Mixed Particle Systems. SiC silicon faced 6H substrates. 0.3M KMnO4, pH 3.0. Coating is Mn(III)/Mn(IV).

slurry_preparation.abrasive_material: 1% coated 135 nm silica + 1% coated 0.8 micron alumina

samples.experiment_context: Example 6: Mixed Particle Systems. SiC silicon faced 6H substrates. 0.3M KMnO4, pH 3.0. Coating is Mn(III)/Mn(IV).

slurry_preparation.abrasive_material: 1% coated 135 nm silica + 0.1% 0.2 micron diamond BN

samples.experiment_context: Example 7: Si Face Versus Carbon Face SiC Substrates. 1% coated particle (from Ex1, pH 3.0 type) using 0.3M KMnO4 slurry.
Example 7: Si Face Versus Carbon Face SiC Substrates. 1% coated particle (from Ex1, pH 3.0 type) using 0.3M KMnO4 slurry.
Example 8: Polishing of Si-C Containing Compounds (BD1 - Black Diamond). pH 3.0, 1% coated 75nm silica particles, 2 psi.

cmp_performance.polished_material: BD1 (low dielectric constant material, Si-C-O, N-doped)
